Overview.Description: Manage changes over time to code and data, enabling team coordination.

Options.Option: Prompt for Checkout on Package Modification

Options.Description: Add new files to source control on modification.
File path for diffing text files.

Steps: In the Source Control section, click Connect to Source Control.
Enter information and click Accept Settings.

Icons.Description: Asset checked out by another user.
Newer version available in source control.

Checking_Out_and_In.Check_Out: Right-click asset and choose Check Out.
Check_In: Right-click asset and choose Check In.

Content_Hot_Reloading.Description: Auto-reload content on modification via source control.
Content_Hot_Reloading.Manual_Reload: Right-click asset and select Reload under Asset Actions.

Deactivating_Source_Control.Warning: Only deactivate if certain, as it will desynchronize content.
Steps: Click green double-arrow icon in Level Editor.
Green icon changes to red circle with slash.
